controllers.smc.algorithms.super_twisting.config¶

Source: src\controllers\smc\algorithms\super_twisting\config.py

Module Overview¶

Configuration Schema for Super-Twisting SMC.

Type-safe configuration for Super-Twisting Sliding Mode Control (STA-SMC). Implements second-order sliding mode control for finite-time convergence.

Mathematical Requirements:

  • Twisting gains: K1 > K2 > 0 for stability and finite-time convergence

  • Surface gains: [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for Hurwitz stability

  • Anti-windup: Prevents integrator windup in the twisting algorithm

Complete Source Code¶

  1#======================================================================================\\\
  2#============== src/controllers/smc/algorithms/super_twisting/config.py ===============\\\
  3#======================================================================================\\\
  4
  5"""
  6Configuration Schema for Super-Twisting SMC.
  7
  8Type-safe configuration for Super-Twisting Sliding Mode Control (STA-SMC).
  9Implements second-order sliding mode control for finite-time convergence.
 10
 11Mathematical Requirements:
 12- Twisting gains: K1 > K2 > 0 for stability and finite-time convergence
 13- Surface gains: [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for Hurwitz stability
 14- Anti-windup: Prevents integrator windup in the twisting algorithm
 15"""
 16
 17from typing import List, Optional
 18from dataclasses import dataclass, field
 19import math
 20
 21
 22@dataclass(frozen=True)
 23class SuperTwistingSMCConfig:
 24    """
 25    Type-safe configuration for Super-Twisting SMC controller.
 26
 27    Based on Super-Twisting algorithm theory:
 28    - Twisting gains K1, K2 must satisfy K1 > K2 > 0 for finite-time stability
 29    - Surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for Hurwitz stability
 30    - Power exponent α ∈ (0, 1) determines convergence rate
 31    """
 32
 33    # Required parameters
 34    gains: List[float] = field()                           # [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]
 35    max_force: float = field()                             # Control saturation limit
 36    dt: float = field()                                    # Control timestep
 37
 38    # Super-Twisting specific parameters
 39    damping_gain: float = field(default=0.0)               # Additional damping
 40    anti_windup_gain: Optional[float] = field(default=None) # Anti-windup for integrator
 41    power_exponent: float = field(default=0.5)             # α for |s|^α term
 42
 43    # Boundary layer and switching
 44    boundary_layer: float = field(default=0.01)            # Chattering reduction
 45    switch_method: str = field(default="tanh")             # Switching function type
 46
 47    # Numerical stability parameters (standardized with AdaptiveRegularizer)
 48    regularization_alpha: float = field(default=1e-4)      # Base regularization scaling factor
 49    min_regularization: float = field(default=1e-10)       # Minimum regularization
 50    max_condition_number: float = field(default=1e14)      # Maximum acceptable condition number
 51    use_adaptive_regularization: bool = field(default=True) # Use adaptive vs fixed regularization
 52
 53    # Optional dynamics model
 54    dynamics_model: Optional[object] = field(default=None, compare=False)
 55
 56    def __post_init__(self):
 57        """Validate configuration after creation."""
 58        self._validate_gains()
 59        self._validate_twisting_parameters()
 60        self._validate_other_parameters()
 61
 62    def _validate_gains(self) -> None:
 63        """Validate gain vector according to Super-Twisting theory."""
 64        if len(self.gains) != 6:
 65            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting SMC requires exactly 6 gains: [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]")
 66
 67        K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2 = self.gains
 68
 69        # Twisting gains stability condition: K1 > K2 > 0
 70        if K1 <= 0 or K2 <= 0:
 71            raise ValueError("Twisting gains K1, K2 must be positive")
 72
 73        if K2 >= K1:
 74            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting stability requires K1 > K2 > 0")
 75
 76        # Surface gains must be positive for Hurwitz stability
 77        if any(g <= 0 for g in [k1, k2, lam1, lam2]):
 78            raise ValueError("Surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for stability")
 79
 80    def _validate_twisting_parameters(self) -> None:
 81        """Validate Super-Twisting specific parameters."""
 82        if self.damping_gain < 0:
 83            raise ValueError("Damping gain must be non-negative")
 84
 85        if self.anti_windup_gain is not None and self.anti_windup_gain <= 0:
 86            raise ValueError("Anti-windup gain must be positive when specified")
 87
 88        if not (0 < self.power_exponent <= 1):
 89            raise ValueError("Power exponent must be in (0, 1] for convergence")
 90
 91        # Warn if power exponent is not 0.5 (standard Super-Twisting)
 92        if abs(self.power_exponent - 0.5) > 1e-6:
 93            import warnings
 94            warnings.warn(f"Non-standard power exponent {self.power_exponent}. "
 95                         "Standard Super-Twisting uses α = 0.5", UserWarning)
 96
 97    def _validate_other_parameters(self) -> None:
 98        """Validate other configuration parameters."""
 99        if self.max_force <= 0:
100            raise ValueError("max_force must be positive")
101
102        if self.dt <= 0:
103            raise ValueError("dt must be positive")
104
105        if self.boundary_layer <= 0:
106            raise ValueError("boundary_layer must be positive")
107
108        # Validate regularization parameters
109        if self.regularization_alpha <= 0:
110            raise ValueError("regularization_alpha must be positive")
111        if self.min_regularization <= 0:
112            raise ValueError("min_regularization must be positive")
113        if self.max_condition_number <= 0:
114            raise ValueError("max_condition_number must be positive")
115
116        if self.switch_method not in ("tanh", "linear", "sign"):
117            raise ValueError("switch_method must be 'tanh', 'linear', or 'sign'")
118
119    @property
120    def K1(self) -> float:
121        """First twisting gain."""
122        return self.gains[0]
123
124    @property
125    def K2(self) -> float:
126        """Second twisting gain."""
127        return self.gains[1]
128
129    @property
130    def k1(self) -> float:
131        """Joint 1 position gain."""
132        return self.gains[2]
133
134    @property
135    def k2(self) -> float:
136        """Joint 2 position gain."""
137        return self.gains[3]
138
139    @property
140    def lam1(self) -> float:
141        """Joint 1 velocity gain (λ₁)."""
142        return self.gains[4]
143
144    @property
145    def lam2(self) -> float:
146        """Joint 2 velocity gain (λ₂)."""
147        return self.gains[5]
148
149    def get_twisting_gains(self) -> tuple[float, float]:
150        """Get Super-Twisting gains (K1, K2)."""
151        return (self.K1, self.K2)
152
153    def get_surface_gains(self) -> List[float]:
154        """Get sliding surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2]."""
155        return self.gains[2:]
156
157    def check_stability_conditions(self) -> dict:
158        """
159        Check Super-Twisting stability conditions.
160
161        Returns:
162            Dictionary with stability analysis
163        """
164        K1, K2 = self.get_twisting_gains()
165
166        # Basic stability: K1 > K2 > 0
167        basic_stable = K1 > K2 > 0
168
169        # Enhanced stability condition (sufficient for finite-time convergence)
170        # Requires specific relationship between K1 and K2
171        ratio = K1 / K2 if K2 > 0 else float('inf')
172        enhanced_stable = ratio > 1.1  # Margin for robustness
173
174        # Convergence time estimate (approximate)
175        if basic_stable and self.power_exponent == 0.5:
176            # T_conv ≈ 2 / (K2^0.5) for standard Super-Twisting
177            convergence_time_est = 2.0 / math.sqrt(K2) if K2 > 0 else float('inf')
178        else:
179            convergence_time_est = float('inf')
180
181        return {
182            'basic_stability': basic_stable,
183            'enhanced_stability': enhanced_stable,
184            'gain_ratio': ratio,
185            'convergence_time_estimate': convergence_time_est,
186            'power_exponent_standard': abs(self.power_exponent - 0.5) < 1e-6
187        }
188
189    def get_effective_anti_windup_gain(self) -> float:
190        """Get effective anti-windup gain."""
191        if self.anti_windup_gain is not None:
192            return self.anti_windup_gain
193        # Default: proportional to twisting gains
194        return 0.1 * (self.K1 + self.K2)
195
196    def to_dict(self) -> dict:
197        """Convert configuration to dictionary."""
198        return {
199            'gains': list(self.gains),
200            'max_force': self.max_force,
201            'dt': self.dt,
202            'damping_gain': self.damping_gain,
203            'anti_windup_gain': self.anti_windup_gain,
204            'power_exponent': self.power_exponent,
205            'boundary_layer': self.boundary_layer,
206            'switch_method': self.switch_method,
207            'regularization_alpha': self.regularization_alpha,
208            'min_regularization': self.min_regularization,
209            'max_condition_number': self.max_condition_number,
210            'use_adaptive_regularization': self.use_adaptive_regularization
211        }
212
213    @classmethod
214    def from_dict(cls, config_dict: dict, dynamics_model=None) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
215        """Create configuration from dictionary."""
216        config_dict = config_dict.copy()
217        config_dict['dynamics_model'] = dynamics_model
218        return cls(**config_dict)
219
220    @classmethod
221    def create_default(cls, gains: List[float], max_force: float = 100.0,
222                      dt: float = 0.01, **kwargs) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
223        """Create configuration with sensible defaults."""
224        return cls(
225            gains=gains,
226            max_force=max_force,
227            dt=dt,
228            **kwargs
229        )
230
231    @classmethod
232    def create_from_classical_gains(cls, classical_gains: List[float],
233                                   K1: float, K2: float, **kwargs) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
234        """
235        Create Super-Twisting config from classical SMC gains.
236
237        Args:
238            classical_gains: [k1, k2, lam1, lam2] from classical SMC
239            K1, K2: Super-Twisting gains (K1 > K2 > 0)
240            **kwargs: Additional parameters
241
242        Returns:
243            Super-Twisting configuration
244        """
245        if len(classical_gains) < 4:
246            raise ValueError("Classical gains must have at least 4 elements")
247
248        if K2 >= K1 or K1 <= 0 or K2 <= 0:
249            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting requires K1 > K2 > 0")
250
251        sta_gains = [K1, K2] + list(classical_gains[:4])
252
253        return cls(gains=sta_gains, **kwargs)

Classes¶

SuperTwistingSMCConfig¶

Type-safe configuration for Super-Twisting SMC controller.

Based on Super-Twisting algorithm theory:

  • Twisting gains K1, K2 must satisfy K1 > K2 > 0 for finite-time stability

  • Surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for Hurwitz stability

  • Power exponent α ∈ (0, 1) determines convergence rate

Source Code¶

  1@dataclass(frozen=True)
  2class SuperTwistingSMCConfig:
  3    """
  4    Type-safe configuration for Super-Twisting SMC controller.
  5
  6    Based on Super-Twisting algorithm theory:
  7    - Twisting gains K1, K2 must satisfy K1 > K2 > 0 for finite-time stability
  8    - Surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for Hurwitz stability
  9    - Power exponent α ∈ (0, 1) determines convergence rate
 10    """
 11
 12    # Required parameters
 13    gains: List[float] = field()                           # [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]
 14    max_force: float = field()                             # Control saturation limit
 15    dt: float = field()                                    # Control timestep
 16
 17    # Super-Twisting specific parameters
 18    damping_gain: float = field(default=0.0)               # Additional damping
 19    anti_windup_gain: Optional[float] = field(default=None) # Anti-windup for integrator
 20    power_exponent: float = field(default=0.5)             # α for |s|^α term
 21
 22    # Boundary layer and switching
 23    boundary_layer: float = field(default=0.01)            # Chattering reduction
 24    switch_method: str = field(default="tanh")             # Switching function type
 25
 26    # Numerical stability parameters (standardized with AdaptiveRegularizer)
 27    regularization_alpha: float = field(default=1e-4)      # Base regularization scaling factor
 28    min_regularization: float = field(default=1e-10)       # Minimum regularization
 29    max_condition_number: float = field(default=1e14)      # Maximum acceptable condition number
 30    use_adaptive_regularization: bool = field(default=True) # Use adaptive vs fixed regularization
 31
 32    # Optional dynamics model
 33    dynamics_model: Optional[object] = field(default=None, compare=False)
 34
 35    def __post_init__(self):
 36        """Validate configuration after creation."""
 37        self._validate_gains()
 38        self._validate_twisting_parameters()
 39        self._validate_other_parameters()
 40
 41    def _validate_gains(self) -> None:
 42        """Validate gain vector according to Super-Twisting theory."""
 43        if len(self.gains) != 6:
 44            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting SMC requires exactly 6 gains: [K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2]")
 45
 46        K1, K2, k1, k2, lam1, lam2 = self.gains
 47
 48        # Twisting gains stability condition: K1 > K2 > 0
 49        if K1 <= 0 or K2 <= 0:
 50            raise ValueError("Twisting gains K1, K2 must be positive")
 51
 52        if K2 >= K1:
 53            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting stability requires K1 > K2 > 0")
 54
 55        # Surface gains must be positive for Hurwitz stability
 56        if any(g <= 0 for g in [k1, k2, lam1, lam2]):
 57            raise ValueError("Surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2] must be positive for stability")
 58
 59    def _validate_twisting_parameters(self) -> None:
 60        """Validate Super-Twisting specific parameters."""
 61        if self.damping_gain < 0:
 62            raise ValueError("Damping gain must be non-negative")
 63
 64        if self.anti_windup_gain is not None and self.anti_windup_gain <= 0:
 65            raise ValueError("Anti-windup gain must be positive when specified")
 66
 67        if not (0 < self.power_exponent <= 1):
 68            raise ValueError("Power exponent must be in (0, 1] for convergence")
 69
 70        # Warn if power exponent is not 0.5 (standard Super-Twisting)
 71        if abs(self.power_exponent - 0.5) > 1e-6:
 72            import warnings
 73            warnings.warn(f"Non-standard power exponent {self.power_exponent}. "
 74                         "Standard Super-Twisting uses α = 0.5", UserWarning)
 75
 76    def _validate_other_parameters(self) -> None:
 77        """Validate other configuration parameters."""
 78        if self.max_force <= 0:
 79            raise ValueError("max_force must be positive")
 80
 81        if self.dt <= 0:
 82            raise ValueError("dt must be positive")
 83
 84        if self.boundary_layer <= 0:
 85            raise ValueError("boundary_layer must be positive")
 86
 87        # Validate regularization parameters
 88        if self.regularization_alpha <= 0:
 89            raise ValueError("regularization_alpha must be positive")
 90        if self.min_regularization <= 0:
 91            raise ValueError("min_regularization must be positive")
 92        if self.max_condition_number <= 0:
 93            raise ValueError("max_condition_number must be positive")
 94
 95        if self.switch_method not in ("tanh", "linear", "sign"):
 96            raise ValueError("switch_method must be 'tanh', 'linear', or 'sign'")
 97
 98    @property
 99    def K1(self) -> float:
100        """First twisting gain."""
101        return self.gains[0]
102
103    @property
104    def K2(self) -> float:
105        """Second twisting gain."""
106        return self.gains[1]
107
108    @property
109    def k1(self) -> float:
110        """Joint 1 position gain."""
111        return self.gains[2]
112
113    @property
114    def k2(self) -> float:
115        """Joint 2 position gain."""
116        return self.gains[3]
117
118    @property
119    def lam1(self) -> float:
120        """Joint 1 velocity gain (λ₁)."""
121        return self.gains[4]
122
123    @property
124    def lam2(self) -> float:
125        """Joint 2 velocity gain (λ₂)."""
126        return self.gains[5]
127
128    def get_twisting_gains(self) -> tuple[float, float]:
129        """Get Super-Twisting gains (K1, K2)."""
130        return (self.K1, self.K2)
131
132    def get_surface_gains(self) -> List[float]:
133        """Get sliding surface gains [k1, k2, λ1, λ2]."""
134        return self.gains[2:]
135
136    def check_stability_conditions(self) -> dict:
137        """
138        Check Super-Twisting stability conditions.
139
140        Returns:
141            Dictionary with stability analysis
142        """
143        K1, K2 = self.get_twisting_gains()
144
145        # Basic stability: K1 > K2 > 0
146        basic_stable = K1 > K2 > 0
147
148        # Enhanced stability condition (sufficient for finite-time convergence)
149        # Requires specific relationship between K1 and K2
150        ratio = K1 / K2 if K2 > 0 else float('inf')
151        enhanced_stable = ratio > 1.1  # Margin for robustness
152
153        # Convergence time estimate (approximate)
154        if basic_stable and self.power_exponent == 0.5:
155            # T_conv ≈ 2 / (K2^0.5) for standard Super-Twisting
156            convergence_time_est = 2.0 / math.sqrt(K2) if K2 > 0 else float('inf')
157        else:
158            convergence_time_est = float('inf')
159
160        return {
161            'basic_stability': basic_stable,
162            'enhanced_stability': enhanced_stable,
163            'gain_ratio': ratio,
164            'convergence_time_estimate': convergence_time_est,
165            'power_exponent_standard': abs(self.power_exponent - 0.5) < 1e-6
166        }
167
168    def get_effective_anti_windup_gain(self) -> float:
169        """Get effective anti-windup gain."""
170        if self.anti_windup_gain is not None:
171            return self.anti_windup_gain
172        # Default: proportional to twisting gains
173        return 0.1 * (self.K1 + self.K2)
174
175    def to_dict(self) -> dict:
176        """Convert configuration to dictionary."""
177        return {
178            'gains': list(self.gains),
179            'max_force': self.max_force,
180            'dt': self.dt,
181            'damping_gain': self.damping_gain,
182            'anti_windup_gain': self.anti_windup_gain,
183            'power_exponent': self.power_exponent,
184            'boundary_layer': self.boundary_layer,
185            'switch_method': self.switch_method,
186            'regularization_alpha': self.regularization_alpha,
187            'min_regularization': self.min_regularization,
188            'max_condition_number': self.max_condition_number,
189            'use_adaptive_regularization': self.use_adaptive_regularization
190        }
191
192    @classmethod
193    def from_dict(cls, config_dict: dict, dynamics_model=None) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
194        """Create configuration from dictionary."""
195        config_dict = config_dict.copy()
196        config_dict['dynamics_model'] = dynamics_model
197        return cls(**config_dict)
198
199    @classmethod
200    def create_default(cls, gains: List[float], max_force: float = 100.0,
201                      dt: float = 0.01, **kwargs) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
202        """Create configuration with sensible defaults."""
203        return cls(
204            gains=gains,
205            max_force=max_force,
206            dt=dt,
207            **kwargs
208        )
209
210    @classmethod
211    def create_from_classical_gains(cls, classical_gains: List[float],
212                                   K1: float, K2: float, **kwargs) -> 'SuperTwistingSMCConfig':
213        """
214        Create Super-Twisting config from classical SMC gains.
215
216        Args:
217            classical_gains: [k1, k2, lam1, lam2] from classical SMC
218            K1, K2: Super-Twisting gains (K1 > K2 > 0)
219            **kwargs: Additional parameters
220
221        Returns:
222            Super-Twisting configuration
223        """
224        if len(classical_gains) < 4:
225            raise ValueError("Classical gains must have at least 4 elements")
226
227        if K2 >= K1 or K1 <= 0 or K2 <= 0:
228            raise ValueError("Super-Twisting requires K1 > K2 > 0")
229
230        sta_gains = [K1, K2] + list(classical_gains[:4])
231
232        return cls(gains=sta_gains, **kwargs)
